author: pk910
content:
not sure what you're trying to achieve ðŸ˜„
It looks like the key you've started goomy with just has no funds?

besides of that, there are 2 executables included with goomy:  `blob-spammer` & `blob-sender`.
The `blob-spammer` is intended to do mass blob spamming and therefore needs a few child wallets to be able to send blobs in parallel.
The other tool `blob-sender` is much easier and sends a single blob from the provided key only.

author: 0xevan
content: why can't I use blob-spammer with a single wallet from the provided key only?

author: 0xevan
content: that's what I wanted to do

author: pk910
content:
hmm, yea, I see.  It currently doesn't support that unfortunately.

But you can use `--max-wallets 1` to create a single child wallet only, which is almost the same.
It tries to prefund the child wallets with 5 ETH, so be sure you have that amount in the root wallet.
